prev.title: API返回的JSON太大？
prev.summary: API返回的JSON太大？ Nginx又没法压缩Transfer-Encoding为chunked的返回？ 新挖了一个坑，欢迎各位使用和提各种建议，适用于Gin和net/http的gzip中间件：基于 Content-Type、Content-Length、扩展名等要素自动判断是否启用压缩。

next.title: today we are going to share a new paper about druid
next.summary: Hi all, today we are going to share a new paper about druid. http://static.druid.io/docs/druid.pdf It's related to the previous share about scuba. They are all column-oriented database storage. Like scuba, The Druid database also has an in-memory data storage strategy.
